mapper.select: SELECT year, month, order_id, total_orders, total_sales FROM sales_tb WHERE year = #{year} ORDER BY month;

SELECT ott.menu_id, ott.order_year, ott.order_month, SUM(ott.menu_count) AS total_count, SUM(ott.menu_count * mpt.menu_price) AS sales FROM (SELECT DATE_FORMAT(order_time, "%Y") AS order_year, DATE_FORMAT(order_time, "%m") AS order_month, menu_id, menu_count FROM order_tb ot LEFT OUTER JOIN order_detail_tb olt ON olt.order_id = ot.order_id) ott LEFT OUTER JOIN menu_tb mt ON mt.menu_id = ott.menu_id LEFT OUTER JOIN menu_price_tb mpt ON mpt.menu_id = mt.menu_id GROUP BY ott.order_year, ott.order_month, ott.menu_id ORDER BY ott.order_year, ott.order_month;
